TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdCreatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时控件的页上显示广告。The event is raised when the control displays an advertisement on the page. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和编写代码的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. 获取与播发相关联的 URL 时控件获取创建并将其显示在控件的下方。It gets the URL associated with the advertisement when the control gets created and displays it below the control. 此示例需要下面的示例中列出的 XML 文件 (Ads.xml)。This example requires the XML file (Ads.xml) listed in the example below. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅属性的类。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ``` [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/CS/adcreatedeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventHandler/VB/adcreatedeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.IDictionary adProperties) cil managed

param.name: adProperties
param.span: 包含 XML 文件中公布属性的 。

span.span: A containing the advertisement properties from the XML file.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||值`adProperties`参数如果`adProperties`参数不是`null`; 否则为一个空。The value of the `adProperties` parameter if the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`; otherwise, an empty .| ||如果`adProperties`参数不是`null`中的值`adProperties`参数，它表示的备用文本; 否则为。If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the alternate text; otherwise, .| ||如果`adProperties`参数不是`null`中的值`adProperties`参数，它表示的图像的 URL，以显示; 否则为。If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the URL of the image to display; otherwise, .| ||如果`adProperties`参数不是`null`中的值`adProperties`表示要为; 否则为导航的 URL 参数。If the `adProperties` parameter is not `null`, the value in the `adProperties` parameter that represents the URL to navigate to; otherwise, .|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AdProperties As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ AdProperties { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个 对象，该对象包含当前显示公布的所有公布属性。

span.span: Gets a object that contains all the advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement.

value.span: ，它包含当前显示的广告的广告属性列表。

span.span: A that contains a list of advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取对象，其中包含当前显示的播发的播发属性。Use the property to get a object that contains the advertisement properties for the currently displayed advertisement. 键和值的对象属于类型。The keys and values of the object are of type . 控件随机选择播发每次在网页上显示控件。The control randomly selects an advertisement each time the control is displayed on the Web page. 选择的播发的属性将从播发 XML 文件中提取并存储在对象。The attributes for the selected advertisement are extracted from the advertisement XML file and stored in a object. 当控件创建的新实例类，属性获取使用初始化对象。When the control creates a new instance of the class, the property gets initialized with the object. 也可以在播发 XML 文件中包含有关播发，广告标题，如自定义属性。Custom attributes about an advertisement, such as an advertisement caption, can also be included in the advertisement XML file. 使用此属性在事件处理程序以获取自定义属性。Use this property in the event handler to get the custom attributes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的属性事件处理程序以提供自定义的描述文字。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in the event handler to provide a custom caption. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-xml[Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example#1](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic AdCreatedEventArgs.AdProperties Example/Common/Ads.xml#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在播发 XML 文件中包含有关播发的自定义属性。The following code example demonstrates how to include custom attributes about an advertisement in the advertisement XML file. XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅属性的类。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ AlternateText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.AlternateText : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置当公布图像不可用时显示在 控件中的替换文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternate text displayed in the control when the advertisement image is unavailable.

summary.span: 支持工具提示功能的浏览器将此文本显示为公布的工具提示。

span.span: Browsers that support the ToolTips feature display this text as a ToolTip for the advertisement.

value.span: 公布图像不可用时，代替该图像显示的文本。

span.span: The text displayed in place of the advertisement image if the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定如果在指定的图像显示文本属性不可用。Use the property to specify the text to display if the image specified in the property is not available. 支持工具提示功能的浏览器，此文本也显示为播发的工具提示。In browsers that support the ToolTips feature, this text also appears as a ToolTip for the advertisement. 单独的 XML 文件包含显示播发的属性。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 控件将自动设置用 XML 文件中相应的备用文本项的属性。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding alternate text entry in the XML file. 此外可以使用此属性以编程方式设置的替换文字。This property can also be used to programmatically set the alternate text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText/CS/adcreatedeventargsalternatetextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsAlternateText/VB/adcreatedeventargsalternatetextvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅属性的类。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ImageUrl : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 控件中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image to display in the control.

value.span: 要在 控件中显示的图像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of an image to display in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的图像的 URL，以显示用于播发控件。Use the property to specify the URL of an image to display for an advertisement in the control. 可以使用相对或绝对 URL。You can use a relative or an absolute URL. 相对 URL 而无需指定完整路径在服务器上相关的网页或用户控件位置的映像的位置。A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page or user control without specifying a complete path on the server. 该路径是相对于网页上的位置。The path is relative to the location of the Web page. 这使得更轻松地将整个站点到另一个目录移动服务器上，而不更新代码中的图像的路径。This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code. 绝对 URL 提供的完整路径，以便将站点移到另一个目录时需要更新代码。An absolute URL provides the complete path, so moving the site to another directory requires updating the code. 单独的 XML 文件包含显示播发的属性。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 控件将自动设置属性相对应的图像 URL 包含公布信息的 XML 文件中的项。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding image URL entry in the XML file containing the advertisement information. 此外可以使用此属性以编程方式设置图像 URL。This property can also be used to programmatically set the image URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用的播发文件，并指定此属性的相对 URL，URL 是相对于播发文件位于目录。If you use an advertisement file and specify a relative URL for this property, the URL is relative to the directory that the advertisement file is located in. 如果设置此属性直接与相对 URL，而不是使用广告文件中，URL 是相对于包含的页面或用户控件的目录控件。If you set this property directly with a relative URL, instead of using the advertisement file, the URL is relative to the directory of the page or user control that contains the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl/CS/adcreatedeventargsimageurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsImageUrl/VB/adcreatedeventargsimageurlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅属性的类。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NavigateUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NavigateUrl : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置在单击 控件时要显示的网页。

span.span: Gets or sets the Web page to display when the control is clicked.

value.span: 单击 控件时要显示的网页。

span.span: The Web page to display when the control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定时要显示的网页单击控件。Use the property to specify the Web page to display when the control is clicked. 此属性的一个常见用途是将导航栏中，重定向时单击控件时，用户可以计数的次数的页面单击播发到目标 URL 的继续操作之前。A common use for this property is to redirect the navigation, when the control is clicked, to a page that can count the number of times the user clicked the advertisement before proceeding to the destination URL. 单独的 XML 文件包含显示播发的属性。A separate XML file contains the properties for the displayed advertisement. 控件将自动设置属性与 XML 文件中相应的导航 URL 项。The control automatically sets the property with the corresponding navigation URL entry in the XML file. 此外可以使用此属性以编程方式设置导航 URL。This property can also be used to programmatically set the navigation URL. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用的播发文件，并指定此属性的相对 URL，URL 是相对于播发文件位于目录。If you use an advertisement file and specify a relative URL for this property, the URL is relative to the directory that the advertisement file is located in. 如果设置此属性直接与相对 URL，而不是使用广告文件中，URL 是相对于包含的页面或用户控件的目录控件。If you set this property directly with a relative URL, instead of using the advertisement file, the URL is relative to the directory of the page or user control that contains the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置属性。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl/CS/adcreatedeventargsnavigateurlcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/AdCreatedEventArgsNavigateUrl/VB/adcreatedeventargsnavigateurlvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何设置包含公布信息的 XML 文件的格式。The following code example demonstrates how to format the XML file that contains the advertisement information. XML 文件的详细信息，请参阅属性的类。For more information on the XML file, see the property of the class. ``` image1.jpg http://www.microsoft.com Microsoft Main Site 80 Topic1 This is the caption for Ad#1 image2.jpg http://www.wingtiptoys.com Wingtip Toys 80 Topic2 This is the caption for Ad#2 ```
